means: （同质）多晶形（现象），同质异形（现象）

word_mean: 多形性，多型性：某个或某种生物具有多种不同的形态或形式
多晶形现象：形成两种或两种以上形式的结晶

sentence.Network_en: This astrocytoma demonstrates increased cellularity and pleomorphism, as compared to normal brain.
sentence.Network_cn: 与正常大脑相比,星形细胞瘤显示出细胞内容丰富并有明显多形性.

sentence.Network_en: This glioblastoma multiforme ( GBM ) demonstrates marked cellularity with marked hyperchromatism and pleomorphism.
sentence.Network_cn: 多形性胶质母细胞瘤 ( GBM ) 显示肿瘤细胞深染和多形性.

sentence.Network_en: The marked pleomorphism and hyperchromatism of surrounding cells also favors malignancy.
sentence.Network_cn: 图中周围的多形细胞和深染细胞也提示恶性.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 两种锥虫在人体内寄生，皆为锥鞭毛体（trypomastigote），具多形性（pleomorphism）的特点，可分为细长型、中间型和粗短型（图11－4）。在用姬氏液或瑞氏液染色的血涂片中，虫体胞质呈淡蓝.

多形性腺瘤（pleomorphic adenoma）是一种包膜情况不一，光镜下以结构多形性而不是细胞多形性为特征的肿瘤。多形性腺瘤是最 …
【讨论】 腮腺多形性腺瘤（pleomorphic adenoma）又称混合瘤，是最常见的唾液腺良性肿瘤，多见于中年成人。临床上主要表现为 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from Greek pleiōn 'more' + morphē 'form' + -ism

means.word_mean: 1. (chemistry) the existence of different kinds of crystal of the same chemical compound
2. (biology) the appearance of two or more distinctly different forms in the life cycle of some organisms
